column5: message
Update README.markdown
Add a variation of the underscore helper that takes a locale
Fix code formatting

Merge pull request #31 from chaione/master

Add null checks to support empty response body
Add null checks to support empty response body (304 Not Modified)
Merge branch 'scrollingtext'
New widget: ScrollingTextView scrolls text across the screen, similar to credits in a movie
Have the remote image view FILL_PARENT in the Gallery widget by default
Fix remote-image-view tests
merge branch riv (rewrite of RemoteImageView to be an actual ImageView)
fix the tests
Ditch the view switcher approach completely; instead, RemoteImageView now handles showing/hiding a progress view itself
Toying around with fixes for the weird layout issue
fix remote image view tests
Fix remote image view tests
Re-implemented RemoteImageView as an ImageView rather than a ViewSwitcher. Tests still failing tho.
Experimenting with turning RemoteImageView into an actual ImageView
Fix bad indentation
Add another RemoteImageView that tests the scaleType attribute
Remove Ant build file
Add a link to the changelog to README.
[maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration
[maven-release-plugin] prepare release ignition-0.2
ignition-location POM cleanup (do not depend on different versions of maps jar)
Bump Android plugin version to 3.1.1
Bump Robolectric version to 1.1.
Rewrite ignition-location sample app to match the format of the other sample apps
Rewrite ignition-core samples to all be in a single sample app
Rewrite samples module for ignition-support to be a single sample app
Provide a constructor in RemoteImageLoaderHandler that accepts a custom looper. This is useful if you need to create the handler on a worker thread, but want to bind it to the UI thread.

Don't use synchronize on the context reference, since it may be null. I don't want to synchronize on the task instance itself unless absolutely required, so simply use a volatile context reference for now.
Add sample project for EndlessListAdapter
Fix documentation bug
Extend IgnitedAsyncTask with callbacks that can be invoked without the need to have access to a valid context.
Synchronize access to the context reference, in case someone reaches out to getContext on the worker thread
Add helper method that can be called from onScroll and which determines whether or not the adapter should load the next page
m2eclipse wants to add the exported flag for the Maven container
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master'
Add a flag that allows one to track whether a task wants to be cancelled on press of the back key
Fix compilation errors in HTTP sample app

Revert "Overload execute() and run() to also take a single argument, since this is the most likely case, and it prevents type-safety warnings from creeping up when passing a single generic argument to the varargs version."

This reverts commit 5999b96906b80612c96d2a52dfa51567273fa065.

Conflicts:

	ignition-core/ignition-core-lib/src/com/github/ignition/core/tasks/IgnitedAsyncTask.java

Revert "Also overload execute() without arguments to prevent compiler warnings when ParameterT is a generic type"

This reverts commit a55cf0447a07ac36c9ddb30efa41de98d76e3bb2.
Make run() method public, so that is can be invoked directly to run a task on a custom thread.
Fix compilation errors on task sample app

Merge pull request #18 from mlc/non-bitmap-errordrawable

allow use of any Drawable for the errorDrawable

allow use of any Drawable for the errorDrawable

Previously, BitmapDrawables were required, but this requirement is easy
to work around. Maybe you want a ColorDrawable or something instead?
Change task handler callbacks to return boolean: if true, the event will be swallowed and not passed on to the task's own callback methods
Fix IgnitedAsyncTask behavior to better deal with the different kinds of handlers. Also add JavaDoc explaining how to properly use the class.

Merge pull request #16 from mlc/dummy-drawable

allow specifying a dummyDrawable but no handler
Also overload execute() without arguments to prevent compiler warnings when ParameterT is a generic type
allow specifying a dummyDrawable but no handler

* Rename the delegate handler interface so that the naming is not as clunky
 * provide a default implementation so as to not force the user to implement all methods
Fix ArrayIndexOutOfBounds in run() when running with empty varargs

Overload execute() and run() to also take a single argument, since this is the most likely case, and it prevents type-safety warnings from creeping up when passing a single generic argument to the varargs version.
Allow a Context to be its own context delegate handler when connecting via connect(Context)

* add XHDPI support
 * remove back compat for Android 1.5
Added additional method to remote image loader so all images can be provided during loading.
add missing dependency to ignition-core JAR
Fix sample projects use an m2eclipse style project setup
Fix compilation errors due to latest changed to IgnitedAsyncTask callbacks
Keep expected status codes in a set, so that re-adding them will not add them multiple times

Add no-argument constructor to IgnitedHttp to make it work with DI frameworks like Guice.

The means that connectivity changes must be listened to explicitly now if that constructor is used.
Refactor IgnitedAsyncTask to be able to forward callbacks to handler classes.

Merge pull request #15 from kevinmcmahon/master

Small fix so ignition-support will compile.

Merge pull request #12 from mlc/master

RemoteImageLoader: properly support servers which don't send a Content-Length header
always Log.d the file being fetched, not just if we know the size
fix README bullet points
add links to JavaDocs
remove name attribute
[maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration
[maven-release-plugin] prepare release ignition-0.1
Add links to FAQ
README fix
drop HorizontalPager from library; there's practically the same widget in Android's compatibility package
Some cosmetic changes to IgnitedDialogs interface, also provide overloaded versions that take string resource IDs.
Added gzip support to http.
Add a NULL check for errorDrawable; if both bitmap and error bitmap are NULL, make this a no-op.

work when server does not give Content-Length

there was some code in there to sort of handle this case, but it didn't
actually behave properly.
A few changes to RemoteImageView tests; we also need to rely on a newer version of Android in Robolectric tests, since otherwise compilation fails, so changed that as well.
Make IgnitedDialogs API more consistent and more flexible (by returning the dialog builder, not the dialog)
Small README update
Add sample app for RemoteImageGallery
Rename WebGalleryAdapter to RemoteImageGalleryAdapter

Improvements to WebGalleryAdapter:
 * reduce number of constructors
 * expose error drawable
 * more JavaDoc

Improvements to RemoteImageView and WebGalleryAdapter:
 * delegate standard Android view attributes to underlying ImageView (fixes #4)
 * reduce number of constructors
 * pass RemoteImageView to WebGalleryAdapter#onGetView so one can configure it

Now that attributes from the Android namespace are supported, the following two attributes have changed:
 * ignition:defaultDrawable is now android:src
 * ignition:progressDrawable is now android:indeterminateDrawable
rename TestIgnitedLocationManager base class
rename ignited-location sample folder
rename ignition-location sample
fix reference to sample app in robolectric test case
rename core samples (p2)
rename core samples (p1)

rename support sample apps (p1)

add links to Google Groups
add Apache license file

more sample app screenshots

Add sample app for IgnitedAsyncTask

* provide an onProgress callback that passes down a context reference
 * update JavaDocs
Fully create the sample activity instead of just the layout
Initial test suite for RemoteImageView
minor changes to sample app layout
Change the interface of RemoteImageView slightly for better testability
Depend on the Android JAR from Central; this will make it easier for people to build the project.
fix the library project reference
expose the custom view attributes through getters
Change ignition-support project structure as per the other modules.
Restructure ignition-core project so as to work with a Robolectric style test setup.
fix artifact ID of RemoteImageViewSampleApp and add it to the build
disable the sample module in ignition-location for now; it conflicts with the overall build structure
fix Maven build for sample apps
revert Android API level dependency to 1.6 for samples

let the two samples target Android 1.6, which is our minimum requirement at the moment
re-add the gitignore files that allows project files under the individual sample folders
add sample app for remote image view
add a defaultDrawable that will be visible when remote image view is not in auto load mode
If auto load is false or if we don't have a valid URL to load, do not show the progress right away.

Use getAttributeResourceValue to read the progress and error drawables. Has this ever worked? ^^

Also some code cleanup.
the location module was added twice; fixed that
point to our new Nexus server for deployments
Re-add ignition-location module to parent build.

Move samples apps to sub folders in their governing modules, since we need that e.g. for the location module when running tests against the app. One can still build all samples at once from the ignition-samples aggregator module.
More work on the sample app for HTTP and response caching
Workaround for the broken Eclipse debugging with tools r16
Add disableResponseCache method.
Synchronize the call to getResponseCache. I was seeing this come back as null in threaded apps when it shouldn't.
Overload clear to be able to not wipe the disk cache, but keep the in-memory data
add containsKeyOnDisk method that checks whether an entry is cached on disk
JavaDoc update
Add a getCachedFiles method that returns all files cached to disk
Bump platform API level for sample projects to 8 (FroYo), so that we can use things like match_parent.
fix bad indentation

Re-add Eclipse project files for projects in the samples module.

Considering how painful it is these days to generate project files via Maven, I think people will be grateful for this.
move samples module to ignition-samples
